usageLimits.question: What are the usage limits for Zentrun?
usageLimits.answer: Zentrun offers two service tiers with different usage limits. The Free Plan and Plus Plan both have limits that adjust based on system demand. Your available credits will reset according to your plan's schedule.

credits.question: What are credits in Zentrun?
credits.answer: Credits represent the computational resources Zentrun uses to generate content like text, images and videos. They measure the processing power, memory, and server time needed for your creations. More complex tasks (longer content,higher resolution images, longer videos, etc.) require more credits than simpler ones.

plusBenefits.question: What benefits does Zentrun Plus offer?
plusBenefits.answer: Zentrun Plus provides the following key benefits: Access to best models and agents, and higher credit allocation for more extensive usage.

unusedCredits.question: Do unused credits transfer to the next billing period?
unusedCredits.answer: No, your credits in your monthly plan will reset at the beginning of each billing cycle. When a new month starts, your credit balance automatically refreshes to your plan's important allocation, regardless of how many credits remained unused from the previous period. This system ensures all users start each month with a predictable resource allocation. However, if you purchase a credits pack, these extra credits will be valid for 3 months from the date of purchase. System will consume your credits in your monthly plan first, then consume your credits in your credits pack.

usageLimits.question: What are the usage limits for Zentrun?
usageLimits.answer: Zentrun offers two service tiers with different usage limits. The Free Plan and Basic Plan both have limits that adjust based on system demand. Your available credits will reset according to your plan's schedule.

credits.question: What are credits in Zentrun?
credits.answer: Credits represent the computational resources Zentrun uses to generate content like text, images and videos. They measure the processing power, memory, and server time needed for your creations. More complex tasks (longer content,higher resolution images, longer videos, etc.) require more credits than simpler ones.

basicBenefits.question: What benefits does Zentrun Basic offer?
basicBenefits.answer: Zentrun Basic provides the following key benefits: Access to best models and agents, and higher credit allocation for more extensive usage.

unusedCredits.question: Do unused credits transfer to the next billing period?
unusedCredits.answer: No, your credits in your monthly plan will reset at the beginning of each billing cycle. When a new month starts, your credit balance automatically refreshes to your plan's important allocation, regardless of how many credits remained unused from the previous period. This system ensures all users start each month with a predictable resource allocation. However, if you purchase a credits pack, these extra credits will be valid for 3 months from the date of purchase. System will consume your credits in your monthly plan first, then consume your credits in your credits pack.

usageCalculation.question: How is my usage calculated?
usageCalculation.answer: Usage varies based on several factors: Length of text, including any files you attach; Length of conversation; Size and length of generated images and videos; Model complexity (more advanced models allow fewer messages or generations).

outOfCredits.question: What can I do if I run out of credits?
outOfCredits.answer: If you've depleted your credits, you have several options: Wait for your daily/monthly free credits to automatically refresh, Upgrade from the Free version to a Basic subscription for a higher credit allocation, or Purchase additional credits packs (available exclusively to Basic subscribers).

checkBalance.question: How can I check my remaining credit balance?
checkBalance.answer: To view your current credit balance, simply click on your the setting button in the bottom left corner. You'll see your credit balance displayed prominently.

changePlan.question: Can I change my subscription plan?
changePlan.answer: Absolutely. You can modify your subscription plan whenever needed by visiting Zentrun.ai/pricing. There you'll find options to switch between Free and Basic versions or manage other aspects of your current plan to better align with your usage requirements.
